Description: Fragment of North Ionian pottery krater rim; whitish slip on top; inside of neck glazed with bands in added white-red-white; maeander frieze on top of rim; broad black vertical strokes on outside of rim; outside of neck black-glazed. Relatively fine brown clay with little mica
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.498)
